info.comment:
This is the start for yibbert's game idea in gray bear productions.

I fixed the button glitch that makes it so they will activate if they are clicked on even if they are hidden. I also added and inventory press I to enter and exit it it says what items it has in it. just fixed the back button.

kill the monster by picking up the sword then clicking the door on the left. click things to pick them up and click doors to use them.

pick up the key to open the door.

click the boxes
to enter the combination.the birthday is the combination.

you can now get information by clicking an object in your inventory. the new key is used to open the door in the first room.

fixed a few bugs


redecorated the whole game.

I tidied it up a bit:

Neatened title screen

Made it so you only see the key after the ghost.

Added a box around the password box.

Just added the story in.


added a secret door.

few new rooms. in torture chanmber in the middle of his cut up sections theirs a red dot click it to find the key for the trrap door.

I upgraded graphics and made the notes more readable.

added 2 more rooms and improved few more graphics.

improved grammer in most places, replaced sprites , the bloody man's gone replaced by a skeleton.I still think we"ve got to change the cover, if you guys think otherwise, then no prob. what about the what happens next, see the first comment. 

Added 2 little things first instead of the man just being a skeloton a ghost turns him into one.

Second try scrolling over the painting in the last room. :D

I added a painting in the room with the first key with eyes that point at your mouse pointer. I also replaced the red dot with a key handle in the room with the skeleton.

Um is this finished now... just wondering.
info.author: 06dknibbs

scripts: the key opens the locked door in the first room
the book says december 12: yesterday was my birthday
enter the code then press a to enter it
wrong code, the door shall not open
you killed me with the sword
I killed you next time bring a weapon
